description: Identify the department with the highest proposed spending on cyber security.
What is the proposed spending for the Department of Education?
Calculate the total proposed spending on cyber security across all departments.
Determine the range of proposed spending values among the departments.
Find any department that has a significantly lower proposed spending compared to others.
Is there a correlation between the type of department and the proposed spending on cyber security?
List the departments with proposed spending greater than 500 million U.S. dollars.
Order the departments from the highest to the lowest proposed spending on cyber security.
How many departments have proposed spending in the range of 200 to 500 million U.S. dollars?
Identify any clusters of departments with similar proposed spending values.
